```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(gt)
library(cowplot)

daughters_case <- read_csv("glynn_sen_daughters_by_case_1.csv") %>% 
  select(-X1) %>% 

daughters_judge <- read_csv("glynn_sen_daughters_by_judge.csv") %>% 
  select(-X1)

```

```{r}
## subsetting the dataset
daughters_case %>% 
  count(area, sort = T)

daughters_case_subset <- daughters_case %>%
  filter(femplaintiff == 1) %>%  
  filter(area %in% c("employment", "Title IX", "pregnancy", "abortion", "reproductive rights")) 
  
daughters_case_subset %>% 
  count(area, sort = T) %>% 
  mutate(fraction = n / sum(n))

n_distinct(daughters_case_subset$casename, na.rm = TRUE)
```
```{r}
daughters_case_subset %>% 
  filter(!is.na(name), !is.na(vote)) %>% 
  count(circuit, sort = T)
  count(casename, cite, name, vote, sort = T) %>% 
  count(name, sort = T)
  filter(casename == "Garcia v. Woman's Hosp.")
```
